strings.Value: "That didn't exactly feel like visiting the temple of a kind goddess..."
"So your scar was sent by Shelyn herself."
{n}Valerie is panting and wiping the sweat from her forehead.{/n} "This is it. Finally."
{n}Valerie turns to Laryen and looks at him expectantly.{/n} "I think it's obvious to everyone here that they atta..."
"There's nothing else for us to do here, {name}. If you don't mind, I'd like to have done with this place."

{n}Valerie scoffs in reply.{/n} "I hope that after this, {g|Shelyn}Shelyn's{/g} paladins will think twice before doing harm to your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}. Anyway, they're usually much more reserved than those fanatics from the Order of Prisms. Let's go! We can discuss it at the capital – I want to see the end of this place as soon as possible."

"... that bloodshed is always a heavy burden on the shoulders of {g|Shelyn}Shelyn's{/g} followers." {n}Laryen shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Forgive them, Valerie. Blind faith clouded their judgment and pushed towards violence, desecrating this holy place. Shelyn's light will not soon return to this vaulting."
"If so, its disappearance can mean only one thing: she's finally left me alone. That's enough for me. Now I want to get some air, so if you don't mind, let's talk later."

{n}Valerie lingers, biting her lip.{/n} "Possibly. Probably. I don't know. Anyway, I must have done something that made {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g} take it back." {n}The girl shakes her head.{/n} "I don't want to think about it. I need some air – to clear my head. Let's talk later."

{n}Fredero puts away his weapon, looking sour.{/n} "But we will do everything in our power to wash away this disgrace. On behalf of the Order of the {g|Shelyn}Eternal Rose{/g}, I offer you, Valerie, and you, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}, my sincerest apologies. The Order of Prisms is young and too... zealous in their judgments of events and signs."

"It's a waste of time! I've had enough. Not a single concession! Not a single word about {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g}! Let them pray to their goddess on their bellies, if she's so precious to them!" {n}Valerie puts away her weapon.{/n} "Let's go! This place makes me want to scrub clean!"
"I am sorry the paladins of the Order of the Prisms chose the path of violence. But it was their decision, and it is not our fault."
